title: Eversoul
description: Your one-stop friendly Neocities web portal for all your favorite content and communities, inspired by the web portals of the 2000s. Support the old/indie web!
author: ReduxFlakes
changes: We made some changes to the site layout, making it more user-friendly and streamlined. We also added new features, like dropdown menus and content-only layouts, to make it easier for users to find what they're looking for.
